title: KONRECO FR Pants for Men Flame Resistant 14oz Heavy Duty Denim Pre-Washed Relaxed FR Jeans
description: FR(Fire-Resistant):Made of 100% Cotton with fire-resistant and complies with NFPA 2112 standards,effectively protecting workers in high-temperature environments such as welding and arc flash. HRC2- Atpv: 17 cal/cm2.

Comfortable and Durable:Not only have flame-resistant properties but also use comfortable and durable fabrics,undergo pre-washing during production,which makes them softer and more comfortable while also reducing the risk of shrinkage.
Strong Sewing:High-strength sewing technology is employed,enhancing the durability and safety of the pants.
Multiple Applications:Suitable for a variety of work environments,including welding,arc flash,and other high-temperature environments,as well as factories,petrochemical plants,and other industries.

Fitting Design:These pants feature a Boot cut/Straight Leg Opening design that not only fits over boots but also conforms comfortably to the body,highlighting a professional image.They are available in a range of sizes to fit different body types.
